alert.note: Alert for Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:06AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, Hardee, Manatee, Polk, southeastern Hillsborough and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 506 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Lake Toho to 11 miles northwest of Wauchula to near Lakewood Ranch. Movement was northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Palmetto, Avon Park, Wauchula, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, The Meadows, Parrish, South Sarasota, and Kensington Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for south central, central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Sarasota
